verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, came בְּאַחַ֤ת <S%H259><s%> be-'a-Chat [month] in the first עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh ten שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, year בַּשְּׁלִישִׁ֖י <S%H7992><s%> bash-she-li-Shi in the third בְּאֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> be-'e-Chad the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh; [day] of the month הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- [that] the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man אֱמֹ֛ר <S%H559><s%> 'e-Mor speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פַּרְעֹ֥ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh unto Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to הֲמוֹנ֑וֹ <S%H1995><s%> ha-mo-No; and to his multitude אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> mi are you דָּמִ֥יתָ <S%H1819><s%> da-Mi-ta Whom art thou like בְגָדְלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1433><s%> ve-ga-de-Le-cha. greatness

הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold אַשּׁ֜וּר <S%H804><s%> 'ash-Shur Behold the Assyrian אֶ֣רֶז <S%H730><s%> 'E-rez [was] a cedar בַּלְּבָנ֗וֹן <S%H3844><s%> bal-le-va-Non, in Lebanon יְפֵ֥ה <S%H3303><s%> ye-Peh with fair עָנָ֛ף <S%H6057><s%> 'a-Naf branches וְחֹ֥רֶשׁ <S%H2793><s%> ve-Cho-resh shroud מֵצַ֖ל <S%H6751><s%> me-Tzal and with a shadowing וּגְבַ֣הּ <S%H1362><s%> u-ge-Vah and of an high קוֹמָ֑ה <S%H6967><s%> ko-Mah; stature וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein was among עֲבֹתִ֔ים <S%H5688><s%> 'a-vo-Tim, was among the thick boughs הָיְתָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-ye-Tah become צַמַּרְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H6788><s%> tzam-mar-To. and his top

מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim The waters גִּדְּל֔וּהוּ <S%H1431><s%> gid-de-Lu-hu, made him great תְּה֖וֹם <S%H8415><s%> te-Hom the deep רֹֽמְמָ֑תְהוּ <S%H7311><s%> ro-me-Ma-te-hu; set him up on high אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- for נַהֲרֹתֶ֗יהָ <S%H5104><s%> na-ha-ro-Tei-ha, with her rivers הֹלֵךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> ho-leCh running סְבִיב֣וֹת <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-Vot round about מַטָּעָ֔הּ <S%H4302><s%> mat-ta-'Ah, his plants וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et תְּעָלֹתֶ֣יהָ <S%H8585><s%> te-'a-lo-Tei-ha her little rivers שִׁלְחָ֔ה <S%H7971><s%> shil-Chah, and sent out אֶ֖ל <S%H413><s%> 'el to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עֲצֵ֥י <S%H6086><s%> 'a-Tzei unto all the trees הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh. of the field

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> ken after that גָּבְהָ֣א <S%H1361><s%> ga-ve-Ha was exalted קֹמָת֔וֹ <S%H6967><s%> ko-ma-To, Therefore his height מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol all עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> 'a-Tzei above all the trees הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh; of the field וַתִּרְבֶּ֨ינָה <S%H7235><s%> vat-tir-Bei-nah were multiplied סַֽרְעַפֹּתָ֜יו <S%H5634><s%> sar-'ap-po-Tav and his boughs וַתֶּאֱרַ֧כְנָה <S%H748><s%> vat-te-'e-Rach-nah became long; פֹארֹתֹו fo-ro-tov כפֹארֹתָ֛יו <S%H6288><s%> fo-ro-Tav bough קמִמַּ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> mi-Ma-yim of waters רַבִּ֖ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim because of the multitude בְּשַׁלְּחֽוֹ׃ <S%H7971><s%> be-shal-le-Cho. when he shot forth

בִּסְעַפֹּתָ֤יו <S%H5589><s%> bis-'ap-po-Tav in his boughs קִֽנְנוּ֙ <S%H7077><s%> kin-Nu made their nests כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All ע֣וֹף <S%H5775><s%> of All the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim, of heaven וְתַ֤חַת <S%H8478><s%> ve-Ta-chat and under פֹּֽארֹתָיו֙ <S%H6288><s%> po-ro-Tav and under his branches יָֽלְד֔וּ <S%H3205><s%> yal-Du, bring forth their young כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all חַיַּ֣ת <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yat did all the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh; of the field וּבְצִלּוֹ֙ <S%H6738><s%> u-ve-tzil-Lo and under his shadow יֵֽשְׁב֔וּ <S%H3427><s%> ye-she-Vu, dwelt כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> kol and all גּוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim nations רַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim. all great

וַיְּיִ֣ף <S%H3302><s%> vai-ye-Yif Thus was he fair בְּגָדְל֔וֹ <S%H1433><s%> be-ga-de-Lo, in his greatness בְּאֹ֖רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> be-'O-rech in the length דָּֽלִיּוֹתָ֑יו <S%H1808><s%> da-li-yo-Tav; of his branches כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah extended שָׁרְשׁ֖וֹ <S%H8328><s%> sha-re-Sho for his root אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about מַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim waters רַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim. was by great

אֲרָזִ֣ים <S%H730><s%> 'a-ra-Zim The cedars לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not עֲמָמֻהוּ֮ <S%H6004><s%> 'a-ma-mu-Hu could not hide בְּגַן־ <S%H1588><s%> be-gan- in the garden אֱלֹהִים֒ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him of God בְּרוֹשִׁ֗ים <S%H1265><s%> be-ro-Shim, him the fir trees לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo not דָמוּ֙ <S%H1819><s%> da-Mu were not like אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- with סְעַפֹּתָ֔יו <S%H5589><s%> se-'ap-po-Tav, his boughs וְעַרְמֹנִ֥ים <S%H6196><s%> ve-'ar-mo-Nim and the chesnut trees לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not הָי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu become כְּפֹֽארֹתָ֑יו <S%H6288><s%> ke-fo-ro-Tav; were not like his branches כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all manner עֵץ֙ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz nor any tree בְּגַן־ <S%H1588><s%> be-gan- in the garden אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, of God לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- could דָמָ֥ה <S%H1819><s%> da-Mah was like אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav in בְּיָפְיֽוֹ׃ <S%H3308><s%> be-ya-fe-Yo. unto him in his beauty

יָפֶ֣ה <S%H3303><s%> ya-Peh him fair עֲשִׂיתִ֔יו <S%H6213><s%> 'a-si-Tiv, I have made בְּרֹ֖ב <S%H7230><s%> be-Ro by the multitude דָּֽלִיּוֹתָ֑יו <S%H1808><s%> da-li-yo-Tav; of his branches וַיְקַנְאֻ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7065><s%> vay-kan-'U-hu envied כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all עֲצֵי־ <S%H6086><s%> 'a-tzei- so that all the trees עֵ֔דֶן <S%H5731><s%> 'E-den, of Eden אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בְּגַ֥ן <S%H1588><s%> be-Gan that [were] in the garden הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him. of God ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen, Therefore כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, GOD יַ֕עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an because אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher it גָּבַ֖הְתָּ <S%H1361><s%> ga-Vah-ta Because thou hast lifted up בְּקוֹמָ֑ה <S%H6967><s%> be-ko-Mah; thyself in height וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten and he hath shot up צַמַּרְתּוֹ֙ <S%H6788><s%> tzam-mar-To his top אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> bein among עֲבוֹתִ֔ים <S%H5688><s%> a-vo-Tim, among the thick boughs וְרָ֥ם <S%H7311><s%> ve-Ram is lifted up לְבָב֖וֹ <S%H3824><s%> le-va-Vo and his heart בְּגָבְהֽוֹ׃ <S%H1363><s%> be-ga-ve-Ho. in his height

וְאֶ֨תְּנֵ֔הוּ <S%H5414><s%> ve-'Et-te-Ne-hu, I have therefore delivered בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad him into the hand אֵ֣יל <S%H410><s%> 'eil of the mighty one גּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim; of the heathen עָשׂ֤וֹ <S%H6213><s%> a-So he shall surely יַֽעֲשֶׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh deal ל֔וֹ lo, כְּרִשְׁע֖וֹ <S%H7562><s%> ke-rish-'O for his wickedness גֵּרַשְׁתִּֽהוּ׃ <S%H1644><s%> ge-rash-Ti-hu. with him I have driven him out

וַיִּכְרְתֻ֧הוּ <S%H3772><s%> vai-yich-re-Tu-hu have cut him off זָרִ֛ים <S%H2114><s%> za-Rim And strangers עָרִיצֵ֥י <S%H6184><s%> 'a-ri-Tzei the terrible גוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim of the nations וַֽיִּטְּשֻׁ֑הוּ <S%H5203><s%> vai-yit-te-Shu-hu; and have left אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- on הֶ֠הָרִים <S%H2022><s%> He-ha-rim him upon the mountains וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol all גֵּ֨אָי֜וֹת <S%H1516><s%> ge-'a-Yot and in all the valleys נָפְל֣וּ <S%H5307><s%> na-fe-Lu are fallen דָלִיּוֹתָ֗יו <S%H1808><s%> da-li-yo-Tav, his branches וַתִּשָּׁבַ֤רְנָה <S%H7665><s%> vat-tish-sha-Var-nah are broken פֹֽארֹתָיו֙ <S%H6288><s%> fo-ro-Tav and his boughs בְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> be-Chol all אֲפִיקֵ֣י <S%H650><s%> 'a-fi-Kei by all the rivers הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, of the land וַיֵּרְד֧וּ <S%H3381><s%> vai-ye-re-Du are gone down מִצִּלּ֛וֹ <S%H6738><s%> mitz-tzil-Lo from his shadow כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all עַמֵּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mei and all the people הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz of the earth וַֽיִּטְּשֻֽׁהוּ׃ <S%H5203><s%> Vai-yit-te-Shu-hu. and have left

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on מַפַּלְתּ֥וֹ <S%H4658><s%> map-pal-To Upon his ruin יִשְׁכְּנ֖וּ <S%H7931><s%> yish-ke-Nu remain כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all ע֣וֹף <S%H5775><s%> of shall all the fowls הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim; of the heaven וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- will be on פֹּארֹתָ֣יו <S%H6288><s%> po-ro-Tav shall be upon his branches הָי֔וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu, become כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> kol and all חַיַּ֥ת <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yat and all the beasts הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh. of the field
